jumpingalien.model

Class Mazub

  • java.lang.Object
    • jumpingalien.model.Mazub

  • public class Mazub
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that implements the player character with the ability to jump, duck and run to the left and to the right. This class is a part of the project JumpingAlien.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jakob Festraets, Vincent Kemps
    Invariants:
  • The effective x position of this Mazub must be valid.
        isValidEffectiveXPos(getEffectiveXPos())
  • The effective y position of this Mazub must be valid.
        isValidEffectiveYPos(getEffectiveYPos())
  • The horizontal direction of this Mazub must be valid.
        isValidHorDirection(getHorDirection())
  • The vertical direction of this Mazub must be valid.
        isValidVertDirection(getVertDirection())
  • The initial horizontal velocity of this Mazub must be valid.
        isValidInitHorVelocity(getInitHorVelocity())
  • The maximum horizontal velocity of the Mazub must be valid.
        canHaveAsMaxHorVelocity(getMaxHorVelocity())
  • The current horizontal velocity of this Mazub must be valid.
        canHaveAsHorVelocity(getVelocity())
  • The x position must be equal to the effective x position, rounded down to an integer number.
        getXPosition() == (int) Math.floor(getEffectiveXPos())
  • The y position must be equal to the effective y position, rounded down to an integer number.
        getYPosition() == (int) Math.floor(getEffectiveYPos())

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mazub(int x, int y, double initHorVelocity, double maxHorVelocity, jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] sprites)
      Initialize this new Mazub with given x position, given y position, given initial horizontal velocity, given maximum horizontal velocity and given sprites.
      Mazub(int x, int y, jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] sprites)
      Initialize this new Mazub with given x position, given y position, 1 [m/s] as its initial horizontal velocity, 3 [m/s] as its maximum horizontal velocity and with the given sprites.

    • Field Detail

      • xPosition

        private int xPosition
        Variable storing the x position to be displayed. The x position is an integer number and refers to the x-coordinate of the left bottom pixel of this Mazub in Cartesian coordinates. This variable does not store the effective x-coordinate of this Mazub, but the effective x-coordinate rounded down to an integer number. This variable is only used in methods concerning the display of this Mazub in the game world. For all other intentions, the effective x position is used.

      • effectiveXPos

        private double effectiveXPos
        Variable storing the effective x position. The effective x position is a number of type double and refers to the x-coordinate of the left bottom pixel of this Mazub in Cartesian coordinates. This variable is used in methods concerning game physics.

      • yPosition

        private int yPosition
        Variable storing the y position to be displayed. The y position is an integer number and refers to the y-coordinate of the left bottom pixel of this Mazub in Cartesian coordinates. This variable does not store the effective y-coordinate of this Mazub, but the effective y-coordinate rounded down to an integer number. This variable is only used in methods concerning the display of this Mazub in the game world. For all other intentions, the effective y position is used.

      • effectiveYPos

        private double effectiveYPos
        Variable storing the effective y position. The effective y position is a number of type double and refers to the y-coordinate of the left bottom pixel of this Mazub in Cartesian coordinates. This variable is used in methods concerning game physics.

      • SCREEN_WIDTH

        private static final int SCREEN_WIDTH
        A variable storing the screen width of the game world.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SCREEN_HEIGHT

        private static final int SCREEN_HEIGHT
        A variable storing the screen height of the game world.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • horDirection

        private int horDirection
        An integer value storing the horizontal direction. 1 indicates moving right, -1 indicates moving left, 0 indicates not moving in horizontal direction.

      • vertDirection

        private int vertDirection
        An integer value storing the vertical direction. 1 indicates moving up, -1 indicates moving down, 0 indicates not moving in vertical direction.

      • initHorVelocity

        private final double initHorVelocity
        A variable storing the initial horizontal velocity of this Mazub.

      • maxHorVelocityRunning

        private final double maxHorVelocityRunning
        A variable storing the maximum horizontal velocity while running.

      • MAX_HOR_VELOCITY_DUCKING

        private static final double MAX_HOR_VELOCITY_DUCKING
        A variable storing the maximum horizontal velocity while ducking. This variable will always have 1 m/s as its value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • maxHorVelocity

        private double maxHorVelocity
        A variable storing the current maximal velocity of this Mazub.

      • horVelocity

        private double horVelocity
        A variable storing the current horizontal velocity of this Mazub. This value will always be a positive number of type double, or zero.

      • maxHorAcceleration

        private static final double maxHorAcceleration
        A variable storing the maximum horizontal acceleration for this Mazub. This variable must always store a positive number of type double or zero.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • horAcceleration

        private double horAcceleration
        A variable storing the current horizontal acceleration. This variable will always store a positive number of type double, or it will store zero.

      • INIT_VERT_VELOCITY

        private static final double INIT_VERT_VELOCITY
        A variable storing the initial vertical velocity. This variable will always have 8 m/s as its value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • vertVelocity

        private double vertVelocity
        A variable storing the current vertical velocity. This value will always be a positive number of type double.

      • vertAcceleration

        private double vertAcceleration
        A variable storing the current vertical acceleration. This variable will always be a negative number of type double, or zero.

      • MAX_VERT_ACCELERATION

        private static final double MAX_VERT_ACCELERATION
        A variable storing the maximum vertical acceleration, the gravitational constant. This variable will always have (-10 m/s^2) as its value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • isDucked

        private boolean isDucked
        A variable storing whether this Mazub is ducking or not.

      • timeSum

        private double timeSum
        A variable storing a period of elapsed time. This variable functions as a timer that increments subsequent time intervals in the method advanceTime.

      • lastDirection

        private int lastDirection
        A variable storing the last horizontal direction of movement of this Mazub within the last second of in-game-time.

      • index

        private int index
        A variable storing the index of the current sprite. The index is an integer number and refers to the position of the current sprite in the array of sprites, belonging to this Mazub.

      • sprites

        private final jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] sprites
        A variable storing all possible sprites for this character. The sprites are images. Each sprite represents a different state of this Mazub.

      • numberOfWalkingSprites

        private final int numberOfWalkingSprites
        A variable storing the number of sprites used for animation of walking of the Mazub.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mazub

        @Raw
public Mazub(int x,
                   int y,
                   double initHorVelocity,
                   double maxHorVelocity,
                   jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] sprites)
            throws IllegalXPositionException,
                   IllegalYPositionException
        Initialize this new Mazub with given x position, given y position, given initial horizontal velocity, given maximum horizontal velocity and given sprites. At the moment of initialization the velocity and acceleration are zero in all directions.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position for this Mazub.
        y - Initial y position for this Mazub.
        initHorVelocity - Initial horizontal velocity for this Mazub.
        maxHorVelocity - Maximum horizontal velocity while running for this Mazub.
        sprites - An array containing the different sprites for this Mazub.
        Preconditions:
      • The initial horizontal velocity must be valid.
            isValidInitHorVelocity(initHorVelocity)
      • The maximum horizontal velocity must be valid.
            canHaveAsMaxHorVelocity(maxHorVelocity)
      • The sprites must be an array with a valid number of sprites.
            isValidArrayOfSprites(sprites)
        • Postcondition:
        The new Mazub has the given sprites as its sprites.
            new.getAllSprites() == sprites
        Effects:
      • This Mazub is initialized with the given x as its effective x position.
            setEffectiveXPos(x)
      • This Mazub is initialized with the given y as its effective y position.
            setEffectiveYPos(y)
        • Throws:
        IllegalXPositionException(x,this) - The given x position is not a valid x position. | !isValidXPosition(x)
        IllegalYPositionException(y,this) - The given y position is not a valid y position. | !isValidYPosition(y)
        IllegalXPositionException
        IllegalYPositionException

      • Mazub

        @Raw
public Mazub(int x,
                   int y,
                   jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] sprites)
            throws IllegalXPositionException,
                   IllegalYPositionException
        Initialize this new Mazub with given x position, given y position, 1 [m/s] as its initial horizontal velocity, 3 [m/s] as its maximum horizontal velocity and with the given sprites.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position for this Mazub.
        y - Initial y position for this Mazub.
        sprites - An array containing the different sprites for this Mazub.
        Precondition:
        The sprites must be an array with a valid number of sprites.
            isValidArrayOfSprites(sprites)
        Effect:
        This Mazub is initialized with given x position, given y position, given sprites, 1 as its initial horizontal velocity and 3 as its maximum horizontal velocity.
            this(x,y,1,3,sprites)
        Throws:
        IllegalXPositionException(x,this) - The given x position is not a valid x position. | !isValidXPosition(x)
        IllegalYPositionException(y,this) - The given y position is not a valid y position. | !isValidYPosition(y)
        IllegalXPositionException
        IllegalYPositionException

    • Method Detail

      • getXPosition

        public int getXPosition()
        Return the displayed x position of this Mazub.

      • isValidXPosition

        @Model
private static boolean isValidXPosition(int x)
        Check whether the given x is a valid x position.
        Parameters:
        x - x position to check
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given x is not negative and smaller than the screen width.
            result == (x >= 0) && (x < getScreenWidth())

      • setXPosition

        @Raw
 @Model
private void setXPosition(int x)
                                  throws IllegalXPositionException
        Set the x-position to display to the given position.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x position to be displayed.
        Postcondition:
        The new x position of this Mazub is equal to the given x position.
            new.getXPosition() == x
        Throws:
        IllegalXPositionException(x,this) - The given x position is not a valid x position. | !isValidXPosition(x)
        IllegalXPositionException

      • getEffectiveXPos

        @Basic
 @Model
private double getEffectiveXPos()
        Return the effective x-position of this Mazub.

      • isValidEffectiveXPos

        @Model
private static boolean isValidEffectiveXPos(double x)
        Check whether the given x is a valid effective x position.
        Parameters:
        x - Effective x position to check
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given x, rounded down to an integer number, is a valid x-position.
            result == isValidXPosition( (int) Math.floor(x))

      • setEffectiveXPos

        @Model
private void setEffectiveXPos(double x)
                               throws IllegalXPositionException
        Set the effective x-position to the given position.
        Parameters:
        x - The new effective x position.
        Postcondition:
        The new effective x position of this Mazub is equal to the given x.
            new.getEffectiveXPos() == x
        Effect:
        The displayed x position is set to the effective x-coordinate, rounded down to an integer number.
            setXPosition((int) Math.floor(x))
        Throws:
        IllegalXPositionException((int) - Math.floor(x),this) The given x position is not a valid effective x position. | !isValidEffectiveXPos(x)
        IllegalXPositionException

      • isValidYPosition

        @Model
private static boolean isValidYPosition(int y)
        Check whether the given y is a valid y position.
        Parameters:
        y - y position to check
        Returns:
        True if and only if y is not negative and smaller than the screen height.
            result == (y >= 0) && (y < getScreenHeight())

      • isValidDirection

        @Model
private static boolean isValidDirection(int direction)
        Checks whether the given direction is valid.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given direction equals 1,-1 or 0.
            result == (direction==1 || direction == -1 || direction == 0)

      • setHorDirection

        @Model
private void setHorDirection(int horDirection)
        Set the horizontal direction of this Mazub to the given horizontal direction.
        Parameters:
        horDirection - Horizontal direction to set.
        Precondition:
        The given direction must be a valid direction.
            isValidDirection(horDirection)
        Postcondition:
        The new horizontal direction of this Mazub is set to the given direction.
            new.getHorDirection() == horDirection

        @Model

        Checks whether the given initial horizontal velocity is valid.
        Parameters:
        initHorVelocity - The initial horizontal velocity to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given initial horizontal velocity is greater than or equal to 1.
            result == (initHorVelocity >= 1)

 @Model
private static double getMaxHorVelocityDucking()
        Return the maximum horizontal velocity while ducking for this Mazub.

      • getMaxHorVelocity

        @Basic
 @Model
private double getMaxHorVelocity()
        Return the current maximum horizontal velocity.

      • canHaveAsMaxHorVelocity

        @Model
private boolean canHaveAsMaxHorVelocity(double maxHorVelocity)
        Checks whether this Mazub can have the given maximum horizontal velocity as its maximum horizontal velocity.
        Parameters:
        maxHorVelocity - The maximum horizontal velocity to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given maximum horizontal velocity is above or equal to the initial horizontal velocity of this Mazub, or if the given maximum horizontal velocity is equal to the maximum horizontal velocity while ducking.
            result == (maxHorVelocity >= getInitHorVelocity()) ||
             maxHorVelocity == getMaxHorVelocityDucking()

      • setMaxHorVelocity

        @Model
private void setMaxHorVelocity(double maxHorVelocity)
        Sets the maximum horizontal velocity to the given value.
        Parameters:
        maxHorVelocity - The maximum horizontal velocity to set.
        Postcondition:
        If the given maximum horizontal velocity is valid, the maximum horizontal velocity is set to the given value.
            if (canHaveAsMaxHorVelocity(maxHorVelocity))
             then new.getMaxHorVelocity() == maxHorVelocity

      • getHorVelocity

        @Basic
public double getHorVelocity()
        Return the current horizontal velocity of this Mazub.

      • canHaveAsHorVelocity

        @Model
private boolean canHaveAsHorVelocity(double horVelocity)
        Checks whether this Mazub can have the given horizontal velocity as its horizontal velocity.
        Parameters:
        horVelocity - The horizontal velocity to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given horizontal velocity is above or equal to the initial horizontal velocity of this Mazub and below or equal to the maximum horizontal velocity of this Mazub, or if the given horizontal velocity is 0.
            result == (horVelocity == 0) ||
             ((horVelocity >= getInitHorVelocity()) &&
             (horVelocity <= getMaxHorVelocity()))

      • setHorVelocity

        @Model
private void setHorVelocity(double horVelocity)
        Set the horizontal velocity to a given value.
        Parameters:
        horVelocity - The new horizontal velocity for this Mazub.
        Postcondition:
        If the given horizontal velocity is possible, the new horizontal velocity of this Mazub is equal to the given horizontal velocity.
            if (canHaveAsHorVelocity())
             then new.getHorVelocity() == horVelocity

      • getMaxHorAcceleration

        @Basic
 @Immutable
 @Model
private static double getMaxHorAcceleration()
        Return the maximum horizontal acceleration of the Mazub.

      • getHorAcceleration

        @Basic
public double getHorAcceleration()
        Return the current horizontal acceleration of this Mazub.

      • isValidHorAcceleration

        @Model
private static boolean isValidHorAcceleration(double horAcceleration)
        Checks whether the given horizontal acceleration is valid.
        Parameters:
        horAcceleration - Horizontal acceleration to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given value lies between zero and the maximum horizontal acceleration.
            result ==
             (horAcceleration >= 0) && (horAcceleration <= getMaxHorAcceleration())

      • setHorAcceleration

        @Model
private void setHorAcceleration(double horAcceleration)
        Sets the horizontal acceleration to the given value.
        Parameters:
        horAcceleration - The horAcceleration to set.
        Postcondition:
        If the given value is valid, the horizontal acceleration is set to the given value.
            if (isValidHorAcceleration(horAcceleration))
             then new.getHorAcceleration() = horAcceleration

      • getInitVertVelocity

        A method to check whether the given vertical velocity is valid.
        Parameters:
        vertVelocity - The vertical velocity to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if and only if the given value is positive or zero.
            result == (vertVelocity >= 0)

        If the given vertical is valid, the vertical velocity is set to the given value.
            if (isValidVertVelocity(vertVelocity))
             then new.vertVelocity = vertVelocity

      • getVertAcceleration

        @Basic
public double getVertAcceleration()
        Return the current vertical acceleration of this Mazub.

      • isValidVertAcceleration

        @Model
private static boolean isValidVertAcceleration(double vertAcceleration)
        A method to check whether the given value is a valid vertical acceleration.
        Parameters:
        vertAcceleration - Vertical acceleration to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only is the given value equals zero or the maximum vertical acceleration.
            result = (vertAcceleration == 0 ||
             vertAcceleration == getMaxVertAcceleration());

      • setVertAcceleration

        @Model

        Sets the vertical acceleration to the given value.
        Parameters:
        vertAcceleration - The vertical acceleration to set.
        Postcondition:
        If the given value is a valid vertical acceleration, the vertical acceleration is set to the given value.
            if (isValidVertAcceleration(vertAcceleration))
             then new.vertAcceleration = vertAcceleration

      • getMaxVertAcceleration

        @Basic
 @Model
private static double getMaxVertAcceleration()
        Return the maximum vertical acceleration.

      • startMoveLeft

        public void startMoveLeft()
        Method to start the movement of the Mazub to the left.
        Preconditions:
      • This Mazub must have a valid initial horizontal velocity.
            isValidInitHorVelocity(getInitHorVelocity())
      • This mazub must have a valid maximum horizontal acceleration.
            isValidHorAcceleration(getMaxHorAcceleration())
        • Effects:
      • The horizontal velocity of this Mazub is set to the initial horizontal velocity.
            setHorVelocity(getInitHorVelocity())
      • The horizontal direction is set to -1.
            setHorDirection(-1)
      • The horizontal acceleration is set to the maximum horizontal acceleration.
            setHorAcceleration(getMaxHorAcceleration());
      • The timer 'Timesum' is reset to zero.
            setTimeSum(0)

      • endMoveLeft

        public void endMoveLeft()
        Method to end the movement of the Mazub when moving to the left.
        Effects:
      • If this Mazub is moving left, the horizontal velocity, the horizontal direction and the horizontal acceleration are set to zero.
            if (isMovingLeft())
             then setHorVelocity(0),setHorDirection(0),
             setHorAcceleration(0)
      • The timer 'Timesum' is reset to zero.
            setTimeSum(0)

      • startMoveRight

        public void startMoveRight()
        Method to start the movement of the Mazub to the right.
        Preconditions:
      • This Mazub must have a valid initial horizontal velocity.
            isValidInitHorVelocity(getInitHorVelocity())
      • This mazub must have a valid maximum horizontal acceleration.
            isValidHorAcceleration(getMaxHorAcceleration())
        • Effects:
      • The horizontal velocity of this Mazub is set to the initial horizontal velocity.
            setHorVelocity(getInitHorVelocity())
      • The horizontal direction is set to 1.
            setHorDirection(1)
      • The horizontal acceleration is set to the maximum horizontal acceleration.
            setHorAcceleration(getMaxHorAcceleration());
      • The timer 'Timesum' is reset to zero.
            setTimeSum(0)

      • endMoveRight

        public void endMoveRight()
        Method to end the movement of the Mazub when moving to the right.
        Effects:
      • If this Mazub is moving right, the horizontal velocity, the horizontal direction and the horizontal acceleration are set to zero.
            if (isMovingRight()){
             then setHorVelocity(0),setHorDirection(0),
             setHorAcceleration(0)
      • The timer 'Timesum' is reset to zero.
            setTimeSum(0)

      • startJump

        public void startJump()
               throws IllegalJumpInvokeException
        Method to start the jumping movement of the Mazub.
        Effects:
      • The vertical velocity of the Mazub is set to the initial vertical velocity.
            setVertVelocity(getInitVertVelocity())
      • The vertical acceleration of the Mazub is set to the maximum vertical acceleration.
            setVertAcceleration(getMaxVertAcceleration())
      • The vertical direction of the Mazub is set to 1 (moving up).
            setVertDirection(1)
        • Throws:
        IllegalJumpInvokeException(this) - startJump can not be invoked when Mazub is still in the air. | (isJumping())
        IllegalJumpInvokeException

      • endJump

        public void endJump()
        Method to end the jumping movement of the Mazub.
        Effect:
        if the Mazub is still moving up, the vertical velocity is set to zero.
            if (getVertDirection() == 1)
             setVertVelocity(0)

      • getIsDucked

        @Basic
 @Model
private boolean getIsDucked()
        Returns the current ducking state of this Mazub.

      • setIsDucked

        @Model
private void setIsDucked(boolean isDucking)
        A method to set the ducking state of this Mazub to true.
        Parameters:
        isDucking - A boolean value indicating the new ducking state of this Mazub.
        Postcondition:
        The new ducking state of this Mazub is set to the given flag.
            new.isDucked == isDucking

      • startDuck

        public void startDuck()
        Method to start the ducking movement of the Mazub.
        Effects:
      • The ducking state is set to true.
            setIsDucked(true)
      • The maximum horizontal velocity is set to the maximum horizontal velocity while ducking.
            setMaxHorVelocity(getMaxHorVelocityDucking())

      • endDuck

        public void endDuck()
        Method to end the ducking movement of the Mazub.
        Effects:
      • The ducking state is set to false.
            setIsDucked(false)
      • The maximum horizontal velocity is set to the maximum horizontal velocity while running.
            setMaxHorVelocity(getMaxHorVelocityRunning())
      • If the ducking movement stops when moving to the right, the Mazub starts running to the right.
            if (isMovingRight())
             startMoveRight()
      • If the ducking movement stops when moving to the left, the Mazub starts running to the left.
            if (isMovingLeft())
             startMoveLeft()

      • advanceTime

        public void advanceTime(double timeDuration)
                 throws IllegalXPositionException,
                        IllegalYPositionException,
                        IllegalTimeIntervalException
        Method to update the position and velocity of the Mazub based on the current position, velocity and a given time duration in seconds.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - A variable indicating the length of the time interval to simulate the movement of this Mazub.
        Effects:
      • The horizontal position is updated with the given timeDuration.
            updateHorPosition(timeDuration)
      • The horizontal velocity is updated with the given timeDuration.
            updateHorVelocity(timeDuration)
      • The vertical position is updated with the given timeDuration.
            updateVertPosition(timeDuration)
      • The vertical velocity is updated with the given timeDuration.
            updateVertVelocity(timeDuration)
      • The given timeDuration is added to the timeSum.
            counter(timeDuration)
      • The last direction in which the Mazub was moving is updated.
            updateLastDirection()
        • Throws:
        IllegalTimeIntervalException(this) - The given timeduration is not a valid time interval. | !(isValidTimeInterval(timeDuration))
        IllegalXPositionException
        IllegalYPositionException
        IllegalTimeIntervalException

      • isValidTimeInterval

        @Model
private static boolean isValidTimeInterval(double timeDuration)
        A method to check whether the given time interval is a valid time interval to simulate the movement of a Mazub.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - The time interval to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given time interval is not negative and it is not greater than 0.2.
            result == (timeDuration >= 0 && timeDuration <= 0.2)

      • updateHorPosition

        @Model
private void updateHorPosition(double timeDuration)
        A method to update the horizontal position over a given time interval.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - The time interval needed to calculate the new horizontal position.
        Effect:
        The new effective x position is set to a new value based on the time interval and the current attributes of this Mazub.

      • updateHorVelocity

        @Model
private void updateHorVelocity(double timeDuration)
        A method to update the horizontal velocity over a given time interval.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - The time interval needed to calculate the new horizontal velocity.
        Effect:
        The new horizontal velocity is set to a new value based on the time interval and the current attributes of this Mazub.

      • updateVertPosition

        @Model
private void updateVertPosition(double timeDuration)
                                 throws IllegalYPositionException
        A method to update the vertical position over a given time interval.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - The time interval needed to calculate the new vertical position.
        Effect:
        The new effective y position is set to a new value based on the time interval and the current attributes of this Mazub.
        Throws:
        IllegalYPositionException

      • updateVertVelocity

        private void updateVertVelocity(double timeDuration)
        A method to update the vertical velocity over a given time interval.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - The time interval needed to calculate the new vertical velocity.
        Effect:
        The new vertical velocity is set to a new value based on the time interval and the current attributes of this Mazub.

      • getTimeSum

        Sets the time sum to a given sum.
        Parameters:

        Postcondition:
        The new time sum is equal to the given timeSum.
            new.getTimeSum() = timeSum

      • counter

        @Model
private void counter(double timeDuration)
        A method to increment the time sum with the given timeduration.
        Parameters:
        timeDuration - the timeduration to add to time sum.
        Postcondition:
        The new time sum is incremented with the given timeDuration.
            new.getTimeSum() == this.getTimeSum() + timeDuration

      • getLastDirection

        @Basic
 @Model
private int getLastDirection()
        Return the last registered horizontal direction of the Mazub.

      • setLastDirection

        @Model
private void setLastDirection(int lastDirection)
        Sets the last registered horizontal direction to the given last direction.
        Parameters:
        lastDirection - the lastDirection to set.
        Postcondition:
        The new last direction equals the given lastDirection.
            new.getLastDirection == lastDirection

      • updateLastDirection

        @Model
private void updateLastDirection()
        A method to update the last registered horizontal direction of the Mazub.
        Postcondition:
        If Mazub is moving to the left or the right, the last registered direction will be updated.
            if (getHorDirection() != 0)
             new.getHorDirection() = getHorDirection()

      • getIndex

        @Basic
 @Model
private int getIndex()
        Return the index of the current sprite in the array of sprites, belonging to this Mazub.

      • isValidIndex

        private boolean isValidIndex(int index)
        Checks whether the given index is a valid index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the index is between zero and the length of sprites.
            result == (index >= 0 && index < getNumberOfWalkingSprites()*2+10)

      • setIndex

        private void setIndex(int index)
        Sets the index of the current sprite to the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to set.
        Precondition:
        The given index must be a valid index for this Mazub.
            isValidIndex(index)
        Postcondition:
        The new index is equal to the given index.
            new.getIndex() == index

      • isMoving

        private boolean isMoving()
        Checks whether the Mazub is moving.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the Mazub is moving to the left or to the right, which is equivalent to if the horizontal direction is not zero (1 or -1).
            result == (getHorDirection() != 0)

      • isMovingRight

        @Model
private boolean isMovingRight()
        Checks whether the Mazub is moving to the right.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the horizontal direction of the Mazub is 1.
            result == (getHorDirection() == 1)

      • isMovingLeft

        @Model
private boolean isMovingLeft()
        Checks whether the Mazub is moving to the left.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the horizontal direction of the Mazub is -1.
            result == (getHorDirection() == -1)

      • wasMoving

        private boolean wasMoving()
        A method to check whether the Mazub has moved left or right within the last second of in-game-time.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the last registered horizontal direction of this Mazub is not zero and timeSum has not reached 1 second yet.
            result == ((getLastDirection() != 0) && (getTimeSum() < 1))

      • wasMovingLeft

        private boolean wasMovingLeft()
        Checks whether the Mazub has moved left within the last second of in-game-time.
        Returns:
        True if and only if this Mazub was moving within the last second of in-game-time and its last direction was -1 (left).
            result == (wasMoving() && (getLastDirection() == -1))

      • wasMovingRight

        private boolean wasMovingRight()
        Checks whether the Mazub has moved left within the last second of in-game-time.
        Returns:
        True if and only if this Mazub was moving within the last second of in-game-time and its last direction was 1 (right).
            result == (wasMoving() && (getLastDirection() == 1))

      • isJumping

        private boolean isJumping()
        A method to check whether this Mazub is jumping.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the current vertical direction differs from zero.
            result == (getVertDirection() != 0)

      • updateSpriteIndex

        public void updateSpriteIndex()
        A method to update the index in the array of sprites.
        Postconditions:
      • If this Mazub is not moving horizontally, has not moved horizontally within the last second of in-game-time and is not ducking, the index is set to 0.
      • If this Mazub is not moving horizontally, has not moved horizontally within the last second of in-game-time and is ducking, the index is set to 1.
      • If this Mazub is not moving horizontally, has moved right within the last second of in-game-time and is not ducking, the index is set to 2.
      • If this Mazub is not moving horizontally, has moved left within the last second of in-game-time and is not ducking, the index is set to 3.
      • If this Mazub is moving to the right and is jumping and is not ducking, the index is set to 4.
      • If this Mazub is moving to the left and is jumping and is not ducking, the index is set to 5.
      • If this Mazub is ducking and moving to the right or was moving to the right within the last second of in-game-time, the index is set to 6.
      • If this Mazub is ducking and moving to the left or was moving to the left within the last second of in-game-time, the index is set to 7.
        • Effects:
      • If this Mazub is neither ducking nor jumping and moving to the right, the index is set to the next walking animation to the right.
      • If this Mazub is neither ducking nor jumping and moving to the left, the index is set to the next walking animation to the left.

      • updateWalkingAnimationRight

        @Model
private void updateWalkingAnimationRight()
        A method to increment the index of the sprite while running to the right.
        Effects:
      • If the current index is lower than 8 or higher then 8 plus the number of walking sprites (m), the index is set to 8.
      • If the time sum has reached a value higher than or equal to 0.075, an incremented index is calculated. The time sum is set to the current time sum modulo 0.075.
      • If the incremented index is higher than (8+m), the index is set to 8 plus the deficit of the incremented index and 8, modulo m.
      • If the incremented index in not higher than (8+m), the index is set to the incremented index.

      • updateWalkingAnimationLeft

        @Model
private void updateWalkingAnimationLeft()
        A method to increment the index of the sprite while running to the left.
        Effects:
      • If the current index is lower than (9+m), the index is set to (9+m).
      • If the time sum has reached a value higher than or equal to 0.075, an incremented index is calculated. The time sum is set to the current time sum modulo 0.075.
      • If the incremented index is higher than (9+2*m), the index is set to (9+m) plus the deficit of the incremented index and (9+m), modulo m.
      • If the incremented index in not higher than (9+2*m), the index is set to the incremented index.

      • getCurrentSprite

        public jumpingalien.util.Sprite getCurrentSprite()
        A method to retrieve the sprite belonging to the current state of this Mazub.
        Returns:
        The sprite located at the current index in the array of sprites of this Mazub.
            result == getAllSprites[getIndex()]

      • getAllSprites

        private jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] getAllSprites()
        Return the array of sprites representing the different states of this Mazub.

      • isValidArrayOfSprites

        @Model
private boolean isValidArrayOfSprites(jumpingalien.util.Sprite[] sprites)
        A method to check whether the given array of sprites is valid.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the length of the array is greater than or equal to 10 and the length is an even number.
            result == (sprites.length >= 10 && sprites.length %2 == 0)

      • getNumberOfWalkingSprites

        private int getNumberOfWalkingSprites()
        Return the number of sprites used for the animation of walking of this Mazub.
